code: public Codec codec(String name) {     Codec codec = codecs.get(name).     if (codec == null) {         throw new IllegalArgumentException("failed to find codec [" + name + "]").     }     return codec. }

comment: /**  * Returns all registered available codec names  */
code: /**  * Returns all registered available codec names  */ public String[] availableCodecs() {     return codecs.keySet().toArray(new String[0]). }
